sentences.en: A jigsaw puzzle can keep me absorbed for hours.
sentences.cn: 一副拼图就能让我沉醉几个小时.

sentences.en: a question that continues to puzzle scientists
sentences.cn: 一直困扰科学家的问题

sentences.en: He thought he had solved the puzzle .
sentences.cn: 他认为他已经解开了那个谜。

sentences.en: He thought he had solved the puzzle.
sentences.cn: 他认为他已经解开了那个谜。

sentences.en: He was puzzled by the reactions to his remark.
sentences.cn: 他对自己的话引起的反应感到困惑不解。

sentences.en: I bet you can't do this puzzle.
sentences.cn: 我敢说,你解决不了这个难题.

sentences.en: I can't answer that puzzle; I give up.
sentences.cn: 我猜不出这个谜语, 我认输了.

sentences.en: I don't know the key to the puzzle.
sentences.cn: 我不知道这个谜语的答案.

sentences.en: I'm in a puzzle as to what to do next.
sentences.cn: 对于下一步该做什么我也不知道.

sentences.en: I've never been able to puzzle her out.
sentences.cn: 我一直对她捉摸不透.

sentences.en: In rehearsing Shakespeare, I puzzle over the complexities of his verse and prose.
sentences.cn: 在排演莎士比亚的戏剧时，其中诗句和散文的复杂让我大伤脑筋。

sentences.en: It's good for students to puzzle things out for themselves.
sentences.cn: 让学生们自己思索解决难题很有好处.

sentences.en: My sister puzzles me and causes me anxiety.
sentences.cn: 我的妹妹常会让我不解，使我焦虑。

sentences.en: She was a puzzle.
sentences.cn: 她是个谜。

sentences.en: She was involved in working out a puzzle.
sentences.cn: 她在聚精会神地解一道难题.

sentences.en: The firemen were in a puzzle about the cause of the fire.
sentences.cn: 消防队员对这场火灾的起因困惑不解.

sentences.en: The meaning of the poem has always been a puzzle.
sentences.cn: 那首诗的含义始终是个谜。

sentences.en: The puzzle niggled away in Arnold's mind.
sentences.cn: 这个谜团在阿诺德脑海里挥之不去。

sentences.en: Their reason for doing it is still a puzzle to me.
sentences.cn: 他们为什么干那件事仍然让我费解.

sentences.en: This process is akin to piecing together a jigsaw puzzle.
sentences.cn: 这个过程和拼图相似。

sentences.en: This puzzle baffles me.
sentences.cn: 这个谜使我困惑不解.

sentences.en: What puzzles me is why his books are so popular.
sentences.cn: 令我不解的是，他的书为什么如此受欢迎。
